name: Michigan Marketing Firm
author: Alex Yoesting

sections.description:
TThis is a small plugin for Michigan Marketing Firm Clients. It has a very small selection of tools currently as this was the basis for me to learn WordPress Plugins.

A brief list of features

Features:

  1. Admin Messages
  2. Login Messages
  3. Hide Unused Sections
  4. Show Quote in top right.
  5. Particle Js
  6. Conditional Scripts

Here’s a link to our homepage https://michiganmarketingfirm.com
sections.installation:
Easy Install Instruction

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Click on the added Mi Marketing button to configure settings
sections.faq:
Will this plugin permanently change anything?

No. Everything is reversable by uninstalling the plugin.

Who is Michigan Marketing Firm?

My company providing marketing solutions to clients across Michigan.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First Upload to WordPress
  • Added readme.txt.

1.0.1

*added code to hide parent theme on projects
*cleaned up some code
*fixed readme.txt issues

1.0.2

*fixed issues with alt text for admin menu
*Added particlejs support!

1.1.1

*Added conditional scripts to Settings
*Bug fixes
*Updated for WordPress 5.1
